Miscellaneous Highlights: Jalen Suggs suffered a back injury and left the game in a wheelchair
Others: Tristan da Silva stepped up in Suggs' absence, leading the team in scoring with 25 points. Goga Bitadze almost recorded a triple-double, contributing 11 points, 13 rebounds, and seven assists. The Magic have been affected by injuries, with Paolo Banchero, Franz Wagner, Moe Wagner, Anthony Black, and Gary Harris all missing games due to various injuries.
